attributes.action: Introduce the Ancient Astronaut theory into the UK curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the Ancient Astronaut would provide a better explanation of the ancient world and their beliefs and how their vocabulary wasn't advanced enough for them to be able to describe what they were actually seeing.
attributes.background: The Ancient Astronaut theory should be taught in UK schools. It has more evidence to back it up that religion does and yet schools are forced to teach religious education.
